problem.markdown:
1. Superficial velocity is the?
() velocity through the voids in packed bed () velocity above the minimum fluidization velocity (x) empty tower velocity in packed bed
2. Pressure drop across the packed bed is calculated using?
() Bernoullis principle () Newtons law (x) Ergun equation
3. Ergun equation is valid for
(x) for all types of flow () only laminar flow () only turbulent flow.
4. The value of sphericity for spherical particles is
(x) 1 () 0.3 () 0
5. Pressure drop across the packed bed is a -------------- function of superficial velocity when NRep>1000
() linear (x) nonlinear () may be linear or nonlinear depending on the velocity

choicegroup.choice: velocity through the voids in packed bed
velocity above the minimum fluidization velocity
empty tower velocity in packed bed

4. The value of sphericity for spherical particles is
5. Pressure drop across the packed bed is a -------------- function of superficial velocity when NRep>1000
